Blast from the past.

We're doing lots of research and looking through old photos for the book we're producing for Robert Menzies College's 50th anniversary.â€¦
data.text:
Welcome Back Formal Dinner ğŸŒ¼ğŸŒ With about 70 new residents, last night was a great way to begin semester 2! We shared in a delicious meal, listened to Tyroneâ€™s amazing performance and were encouraged by artist Ian McGilvary (a previous RMC board member) on being intentional with noticing how to see and learn from others around us! What an incredible night organised by many RMC staff and residents âš¡ï¸ #universitycommunity #livingatuniversity #uniaccomodation #rmclife

Congratulations RMC on the amazing results from semester 1 ğŸ¤© The average marks have improved from 67.7% in 2023 to 69.5% this year! These unit results are some of the benefits of living in a supportive environment right next to the university campus. We are thankful to our academic tutors for their time, effort and ongoing work across the semester in assisting residents at the college. #macquarie #macquarieuniversity #livingatuniversity #academictutors

It is always a privilege to host BlueSky Education who regularly stay onsite at RMC during their time here in Australia. Bluesky Global CEO, Andy Ton and CFO Akihiro Suzuki visited Australia recently, and we had the honour of sharing a wonderful lunch with them and touring them around RMC. Thank you BlueSky Education and we look forward to hosting more guests in the future ğŸ’« For more information on short-term stays or opportunities for conference room bookings, enquire here: https://lnkd.in/gjHYDkyR or email us at conferencesrmc.nsw.edu.au. #conferencerooms #macquariepark #rmclife

Welcome SundayğŸŒ» We are so thrilled to welcome all our new freshers and their families today! Day 1 can be strange, scary and awkward, but this week is designed to help make every single resident (and parent/s) feel comfortable and ready for the semester ahead âš¡ï¸ #movinginday #livingatuniversity #rmclife #university

RMC was delighted to accommodate about 35 high school students and teachers from Hong Kong over the past 10 days through the work of BlueSky Education ğŸ“šâœ¨ The group utilised our conference room facilities for their training program, providing a wonderful and enriching experience for the students. Thank you to everyone who made this visit a success! We look forward to welcoming groups and continuing to offer our accommodation and facilities. For more information on short-term stays or opportunities for conference room bookings, enquire online https://lnkd.in/gjHYDkyR or email us at conferences@rmc.nsw.edu.au ğŸ“§ #accomodation #conferences #rmclife

What a team ğŸ’™ Today we enjoyed a fantastic lunch together as a staff team (sadly missed a few faces ğŸ˜”) to catch up and celebrate the past 6 months. Weâ€™re totally blessed to have such a great team to work alongside and are very thankful for all that they do for the RMC community ğŸ™Œ hereâ€™s to the next 6 month! #rmclife #bestteam #uni

Art Enthusiasts Alert! ğŸ¨âœ¨ Master Peter Davis recently visited the Wollongong Art Gallery to admire the stunning woven tapestry by Diana Wood Conroy. This masterpiece, titled â€˜The Glory of the Lord,â€™ was commissioned in 1973 and graced the dining room of RMC until 2005. ğŸ“š Dive into the fascinating history of this piece in this article: https://lnkd.in/gaXFDB6k. From June 8 to September 1, 2024, the Wollongong Art Gallery is hosting a free exhibition showcasing this incredible tapestry along with many other works by Diana Wood Conroy. Don't miss this chance to explore her breathtaking collections! ğŸ—“ï¸ Exhibition Dates: June 8 - September 1, 2024 ğŸ›ï¸ Location: Wollongong Art Gallery ğŸ”— https://lnkd.in/gbCPG-Gz Photo Credit by ABC Illawarra's Sarah Moss #ArtExhibition #wollongong #TheGloryOfTheLord #ArtHistory #FreeExhibition

At Robert Menzies College, we believe in nurturing not just great minds, but amazing humans ğŸ’™ Our alumni have shown the power of a community united by generosity and vision. Their contributions have helped shape a nurturing environment where compassion, innovation, and excellence thrive. âœ¨ This EOFY, join our esteemed alumni in inspiring the next generation of philanthropists, leaders, and change-makers. Amazing humans are formed here, ready to make a difference in the world. To invest in the next generation, visit https://lnkd.in/gejxaTCb Your contribution, no matter the size, helps turn dreams into reality. Join us in shaping the future today â­ #EOFY #SupportRMC #AmazingHumansFormedHere #rmclife
